column1: ReactFunctComps,Life cycle,"Please write what would be the description for the different useEffect statements. In the same line, enter description or associate them with class based components lifecycle.

column3: // Executes after every render cycle of component.
// Executes every time that the dependency changes.
// Code of the returned anonymous function will execute before the main function every time the dependency changes. The returned anonymous function will start executing on the second render cycle.
